### A database management system: PostgreSQL

[PostgreSQL documentation](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/14/index.html)

#### Handling tables

```{sql}
CREATE TABLE tab (
  col1 VARCHAR(200),
  col2 TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
  col3 TEXT,
  col4 REAL,
  col5 INTEGER,
  col6 BOOLEAN
)
```

```{sql}
INSERT INTO tab (col1, col4, col5, col6) 
VALUES ('abc', 1.23, 6, TRUE)
```

```{sql}
ALTER TABLE tab
```


```{sql}
UPDATE tab
SET col5 = 3
WHERE col1 = 'abc'
```

#### Perform queries

```{sql}
SELECT col2
FROM tab
WHERE col1 = 'abc'
```
